channel.title: CVE Feed for SAKURA Internet Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-34169|2024-08-02T16:01:54.202Z -- sakura%20internet%20inc. -- ts%20webfonts%20for%20%E3%81%95%E3%81%8F%E3%82%89%E3%81%AE%E3%83%AC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%AB%E3%82%B5%E3%83%BC%E3%83%90
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SAKURA Internet Inc. TS Webfonts for さくらのレンタルサーバ plugin <= 3.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-32624|2024-08-02T15:25:36.368Z -- sakura%20internet%20inc. -- ts%20webfonts%20for%20sakura
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in TS Webfonts for SAKURA 3.1.0 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-32625|2024-08-02T15:25:36.497Z -- sakura%20internet%20inc. -- ts%20webfonts%20for%20sakura
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in TS Webfonts for SAKURA 3.1.2 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication of a user and to change settings by having a user view a malicious page.
